Dear All,

Heritrix: I was reading the manual and I have a little problem
u=
nderstanding how I can set up a crawl job. My  task would be to archive
onl=
y certain pages in a crawl job, i.e., I want to give Heritrix a list of URL=
s referring to one page each and I want them to be collected (including all=
 components of that page (e.g., PDF files, images, ...). Anybody here which=
 could give me a hint / sample job definition?

Thank you very much in adva=
nce

.
